cosmos_subattributes_priorities_data_0_2: Crit level as important for crit character
cosmos_subattributes_priorities_data_2_2: HP flat > HP % for C characters (< 11k base HP)
cosmos_subattributes_priorities_data_3_1: Speed is the top PVP stat. Status Res is also quite important.
cosmos_subattributes_priorities_data_5_1: Very important for each character with control (freeze, stun, silence, etc.)
cosmos_subattributes_priorities_data_6_1: Very import to sustain (only for DPS)
